Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 44th overall pick, by Minnesota in 2015...
Injured on 6/15/2018 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 6/26/2019, off Brandon Workman (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/23/2019, off Walter Johnson Jr. (DET)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/6/2020, hitting .583 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Released by Minnesota on 6/9/2020...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 6/30/2020 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
